description: Fix the multiply function in test-file.js
prompt: The multiply function in test-file.js has a bug. It's currently returning a + b instead of a * b. Fix this bug.

description: Improve the divide function in test-file.js
prompt: The divide function in test-file.js could be improved. It currently uses 'var' for variable declaration and doesn't have proper error handling. Update it to use 'const' and improve the error message.

description: Add a power function to test-file.js
prompt: Add a new function called 'power' to test-file.js that takes two parameters 'base' and 'exponent' and returns base raised to the power of exponent.
